text: The mission shall observe the inner Epsilon Eridani system from two to 20 astronomical units in visible light

The mission shall observe the inner Epsilon Eridani system from  for sufficient time to measure a 2*10^(-4) L_star debris disk at 3AU. See Backman et al 2009, http://adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2009ApJ...690.1522B
The mission shall demonstrate operation of a visible nulling coronagraph in space
